### [**Huejutla de Reyes**]{style="color:#990000"}

```{r heatmap_huejutla}
densnv::mp_heatmap(geocoded_datasets = z,
                   cve_edo = "13",
                   locality = "Huejutla de Reyes",
                   status_caso = c(1, 2),
                   week = c(1:53),
                   zoom = NULL,
                   map_type = NULL,
                   alpha = 0.6,
                   static = FALSE,
                   palette = viridis::turbo)
```
